name: Breaker Assault Focus
tags: req_spaceport, engines, offensive, no_build_in, istl_breaker_package, bladebreakers, restricted, no_drop_salvage
desc:
This ship has been optimized for assault roles.

Increases zero-flux speed bonus by %s, reduces weapon flux cost by %s percent. Flux dissipation is increased by a factor of %s. Prevents the use of active venting, and drastically reduces weapon ranges past %s units. Fighter speed increased by %s percent.
short: Increases zero-flux speed bonus by 50, reduces weapon flux cost by 25 percent. Doubles flux dissipation and trims all ranges to 600su or less.

name: Breaker Defense Focus
tags: req_spaceport, defensive, no_build_in, istl_breaker_package, bladebreakers, restricted
desc:
This ship has been optimized for defensive roles.

Increases turret turn rate by %s percent, and shield efficiency by %s percent, as well as reducing incoming HE and Energy damage by %s percent. Also reduces the chance of shield-piercing weapons penetrating the shield. Fighters take %s percent less armor and hull damage.
short: Increases turret turn rate by 50 percent, and shield efficiency by 20 percent. Also reduces the chance of shield-piercing weapons penetrating the shield. Reduces incoming HE and Energy damage by 20 percent.

name: Breaker Support Focus
tags: req_spaceport, offensive, no_build_in, istl_breaker_package, bladebreakers, restricted
desc:
This ship has been optimized for support roles.

Increases weapon range by a flat %s/%s/%s/%s units, depending on hull size. Increases weapon and engine health by %s percent. Fighter weapon range increased by %s units.
short: Increases weapon range by a flat 100/200/300/400s units, depending on hull size. Increases weapon and engine health by 100 percent.

name: Breaker Automation
desc: This ship is fully automated, and does not require - and can not take on - any human crew.
short: Does not require and cannot support crew.
